mapper.select: SELECT A.commentId ,A.contentsId ,A.userId ,A.contents ,A.likeCnt ,A.isDelete ,A.reportCnt ,A.createDate ,A.modifyDate ,B.contents AS CT FROM cmt_comment A LEFT JOIN cmt_comment_reply B ON A.commentId = B.commentId WHERE A.contentsId = #{contentsId} AND A.isDelete = 0
